import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get event type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/types/{EventTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a single event type definition by its identifier. Use this when editing event categories or when you need to resolve an event's type metadata in detail.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventTypeId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List event types: [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.
2. Get details: [GET /api/v1.0/events/types/\{EventTypeId\}](/docs/api/events/get-event-type).

**Minimal Required Fields**: EventTypeId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"EventTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Event type retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a single event type.","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Event type/category for categorizing events.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the event type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the event type is deleted (soft delete)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"EventType"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventTypeItemResponse"},"example":{"Item":{"EventTypeId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a5b-8c9d-0e1f2a3b4c5d","CreatedDate":"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z","ModifiedDate":"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z","IsDeleted":false,"SiteId":null,"Scope":"Global","Name":"Conference","Icon":"calendar-check"},"IsSuccess":true,"Errors":[]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
